title: The zodiake of life written by the godly and zealous poet Marcellus Pallingenius stellatus, wherein are conteyned twelue bookes disclosing the haynous crymes [and] wicked vices of our corrupt nature: and plainlye declaring the pleasaunt and perfit pathway vnto eternall lyfe, besides a numbre of digressions both pleasaunt [and] profitable, ; newly translated into Englishe verse by Barnab√¶ Googe.
author: Palingenio Stellato, Marcello, ca. 1500-ca. 1543.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Henry Denham, for Rafe Newberye dwelling in Fleete streate,
